data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Spartak Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 1, Vadim Karpov is booked for the home team.
Important block from the CSKA Moscow defence as Samuel Gigot fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 4, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Spartak Moscow are coming forward and Jordan Larsson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 8, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Goal! Ezequiel Ponce gives Spartak Moscow a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 11, Zelimkhan Bakaev instrumental with a fine assist.
Sergey Karasev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Sergey Karasev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 17, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 20, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, Free kick CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
In the minute 26, At VEB Arena, CSKA Moscow are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 29, Pavel Maslov (Spartak Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Goal! CSKA Moscow go level at 1-1 through Hordur Magnusson in Moscow.
That's a fine assist from Ivan Oblyakov.
In the minute 33, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Ayrton Lucas (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at VEB Arena.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
In Moscow, Ivan Oblyakov of CSKA Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 36, Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Nikola Vlasic for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 38, In Moscow Spartak Moscow drive forward through Jordan Larsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Ayrton Lucas (Spartak Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 40, Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Georgi Dzhikiya has recovered and rejoins the match in Moscow.
In the minute 42, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Georgi Dzhikiya for Spartak Moscow who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Mario Fernandes for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sergey Karasev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Sergey Karasev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow are pushing forward but Roman Zobnin's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 44, CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
The first-half is over at VEB Arena.
Nikola Vlasic is on target to give CSKA Moscow a 2-1 advantage.
Great play from Mario Fernandes to set up the goal.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Ezequiel Ponce gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 47, Sergey Karasev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce gets in a shot on goal at VEB Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Samuel Gigot is back on the pitch.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 53, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Samuel Gigot.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at VEB Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In the minute 56, Domenico Tedesco (Spartak Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Aleksandr Sobolev replacing Zelimkhan Bakaev.
Domenico Tedesco is making the team's second substitution at VEB Arena with Aleksandr Kokorin replacing Ezequiel Ponce.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) has received a yellow card from Sergey Karasev.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
Spartak Moscow drives forward and Georgi Dzhikiya gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
CSKA Moscow’s Nikola Vlasic is on his feet again at VEB Arena.
In the minute 63, Nikola Vlasic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 64, Sergey Karasev awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Baktiyor Zaynutdinov is replacing Nayair Tiknizyan for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 65, Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at VEB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The home team have replaced Fedor Chalov with Chidera Ejuke. This is the second substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 69, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Spartak Moscow advance rapidly upfield but Sergey Karasev blows for offside.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Chidera Ejuke of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Oston Urunov is on a sub for Nail Umyarov for Spartak Moscow.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
CSKA Moscow's Ivan Oblyakov is on target but unsuccessful.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Konstantin Kuchaev with Jaka Bijol.
CSKA Moscow push forward at VEB Arena and Nikola Vlasic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spartak Moscow defence.
Aleksandr Kokorin (Spartak Moscow) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 85, Sergey Karasev awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, CSKA Moscow make their fourth substitution with Kristijan Bistrovic replacing Nikola Vlasic.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Sergey Karasev will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Sergey Karasev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Aleksandr Sobolev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a CSKA Moscow defender.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
At VEB Arena, Oston Urunov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! Chidera Ejuke extends CSKA Moscow's lead to 3-1.
Kristijan Bistrovic for CSKA Moscow has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
